name: ListEventInvitees
description:
Retrieve a list of invitees for a given event.

Use this tool to obtain details about all invitees for a specific event. The tool is suitable when you need to see who has been invited to an event using its unique identifier.

parameters.name: event_uuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the event whose invitees are being retrieved.

parameters.name: invitee_status
parameters.description: Filter invitees by their status: 'active' for current invitees or 'canceled' for those who have canceled.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the invitee "canceled" or still "active"

parameters.name: sort_order_by_created_at
parameters.description: Specify the order of results based on the creation date as 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending.

value_schema.description: Order results by the **created_at** field and direction specified: ascending ("asc") or descending ("desc")

parameters.name: filter_by_email
parameters.description: Specify an email address to filter invitees by email.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: A token to retrieve the next or previous page of invitees. Useful for paginated responses.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: number_of_invitees_to_return
parameters.description: Specifies the number of invitee rows to return in the response.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Indicates if the invitee "canceled" or still "active"

value_schema.description: Indicates if the invitee "canceled" or still "active"

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order results by the **created_at** field and direction specified: ascending ("asc") or descending ("desc")

value_schema.description: Order results by the **created_at** field and direction specified: ascending ("asc") or descending ("desc")

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
